page.title: 19Local groups,Earlston
page.content: In the village there are several {groups}for children.The younger children can attend{Toddlers and {Playgroup}on some weekend mornings where they have the opportunity to mix with other young children. For older girls, there are{Brownies and{Girl Guides.}The boys have {Beavers, Cubs, Boy Scouts and Venture {Scouts.}They are trained in various survival tactics.They have organised games and camps.These groups all meet in the evening. For{adults}there are football ,rugby and bowling clubs.The ladies have Women's Rural,Guild and Young Wives.
